title: 4 Simple Ways to Appear Offline on Roblox

steps.title: Open the Roblox app.
steps.content: Open the Roblox app. Roblox is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap ☰ or ••• .
steps.content: Tap ☰ or ••• . This will open the menu. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This tab will be next to Security .

steps.title: Tap the drop-down menus and select No one.
steps.content: Tap the drop-down menus and select No one . You may need to enter your account PIN. [2] X Research source Set "No one" for all the drop-down menus in the Privacy section: Who can message me? Who can chat with me in app? Who can chat with me? Who can join me in experiences? Who can see my inventory? Who can trade with me? This will prevent other users from sending you messages, invitations, or joining you.

steps.title: Launch Roblox.
steps.content: Launch Roblox. If you aren't already logged in to your account, enter your username and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click the gear icon.
steps.content: Click the gear icon. You can find this in the top-right corner of the screen. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . A new page will open. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Privacy.
steps.content: Click Privacy . This will be on the left panel. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click the drop-down menus and select No one.
steps.content: Click the drop-down menus and select No one . You may need to enter your account PIN. [6] X Research source Set "No one" for all the drop-down menus in the Privacy section: Who can message me? Who can chat with me in app? Who can chat with me? Who can join me in experiences? Who can see my inventory? Who can trade with me? This will prevent other users from sending you messages, invitations, or joining you.

steps.title: Go to https://www.roblox.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.roblox.com/ in a web browser. If you want to play Roblox without wanting anyone to know, you can create an alternate account. With an alternate account, you don't have to worry about avoiding any users added on your main account. However, this means you won't have access to the items and other perks on your main account.

steps.title: Create an account
steps.content: Create an account . Enter your Birthday , Username , and Password . [7] X Research source You can enter your Gender , but this is optional. Click Sign Up when all the fields are filled out. To avoid getting hacked , make sure to add an email and/or phone number to help secure your account. You'll also need this to get voice chat on Roblox.

steps.title: Log in with the new account.
steps.content: Log in with the new account. Avoid adding any users on this account, since this will act as your new private account. When you're ready to play with others again, you can log back into your main account.

steps.title: Press the Xbox logo on your controller.
steps.content: Press the Xbox logo on your controller. This will open the menu on your Xbox's home page. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to Profile & system.
steps.content: Navigate to Profile & system . This is the tab on the far-right. Use the right trigger on the controller to quickly skip to this tab. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Select your Xbox profile.
steps.content: Select your Xbox profile. A pop-up window will open with your account settings.

steps.title: Select Appear online.
steps.content: Select Appear online . A short list of options will open. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Select Appear offline.
steps.content: Select Appear offline . Your current activity will now be hidden from your Xbox friends. [11] X Research source
